config.sqf
Description

Config file for the mission.

Usage

  • Should be in the main mission folder.

Details

  • This file is used to store private variables and settings for the mission.

Notes

  • Use getters and setters to access the variables in this file.

Functions
is_debug
is_debug =

Simple getter function to return the value of the _debug variable.

Example
// Example usage
_is_debug = call is_debug;
Returns
boolean

The value of the _debug variable.

Notes

see _is_debug for example usege.
